snippet: Dave Hakstol, whom Philadelphia hired as head coach directly from the University of North Dakota, said he would get the team, long known for its aggressive play, to adopt a faster pace.
abstract: Profile of Philadelphia Flyers coach Dave Hakstol, who coached at University of North Dakota for previous 11 seasons; Hakstol is only third man, and first since 1982, to jump from college to NHL job.
lead_paragraph: Dave Hakstol, whom Philadelphia hired as head coach directly from the University of North Dakota, said he would get the team, long known for its aggressive play, to adopt a faster pace.

headline.print_headline: A Coach’s Unusual Route to the Flyers
headline.main: After Unusual Route to Flyers, Dave Hakstol Plots a Radical Ascent
